home.meta_title: PlayFunded ‚Äî We put the risk, you get the wins
home.meta_description: Latin America's sports prop trading platform. Prove your skill across two phases and earn a funded account with real payouts.
home.hero_subtitle: Prove your sports trading skill across two phases and earn a funded account. We supply the capital ‚Äî you keep up to 80% of the profits.
home.step1_desc: Choose your tier from $1K to $25K simulated bankroll. Pay a one-time entry fee to unlock Phase 1.
home.step2_desc: Hit +20% profit in Phase 1, then +10% in Phase 2. Minimum 15 picks each. Stay within the risk rules.
home.step3_desc: Pass both phases and receive a funded account. Trade with our capital and earn up to 80% of all profits.
home.tiers_subtitle: All tiers follow the same two-phase process.
home.sports_subtitle: Trade the leagues you know best.
home.sports_leagues: Liga MX ¬∑ Copa Libertadores ¬∑ Premier League ¬∑ NBA ¬∑ NFL ¬∑ ATP/WTA ¬∑ UFC
home.cta_subtitle: Join hundreds of traders proving their edge on PlayFunded.
home.cta_disclaimer: Entry fees are non-refundable. Payouts are based on simulated performance.

howItWorks.pageSubtitle: A two-phase evaluation to prove your skill, then real payouts from a funded account.
howItWorks.phase1_desc: Reach +20% profit from your starting balance in at least 15 picks. Stay within daily loss and drawdown limits.
howItWorks.phase2_desc: Start fresh. Reach +10% profit in at least 15 more picks. Same risk rules apply.
howItWorks.funded_desc: Trade with a real simulated bankroll and request payouts of up to 80% of your profits on demand.
howItWorks.payout_desc: Once you're funded and have positive P&L, you can request a payout at any time. Here's what to know:
howItWorks.payout_kyc: KYC (identity verification) is required before your first payout
howItWorks.payout_methods: Methods: bank wire, USDT, USDC, Bitcoin, PayPal
howItWorks.payout_split: Your profit split: 70% standard, up to 80% for elite traders

faq.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to know about PlayFunded.
faq.q_what_a: PlayFunded is a sports prop trading firm platform for Latin America. You buy a challenge, prove your sports trading skill across two phases, and get a funded account where you earn real payouts ‚Äî up to 80% of your profits.
faq.q_latam_q: Is PlayFunded available in my country?
faq.q_latam_a: PlayFunded is available throughout Latin America, including Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, Chile, Peru, and more. It is not available in the United States.
faq.q_real_money_q: Am I trading with real money?
faq.q_real_money_a: During the challenge phases, your bankroll is simulated. Once you pass both phases and become funded, you trade on a funded simulated account and receive real payouts based on your performance.
faq.q_phases_a: Phase 1 requires +20% profit from your starting balance in a minimum of 15 picks. Phase 2 requires +10% profit from a fresh starting balance in 15 more picks. Both phases require staying within the risk rules.
faq.q_fail_q: What happens if I fail a challenge?
faq.q_fail_a: If you breach the drawdown (‚àí15%) or daily loss (‚àí10%) limits, your challenge ends. You can buy a new challenge at any time.
faq.q_retry_q: Can I retry a failed challenge?
faq.q_retry_a: Yes. There's no limit on retries. Each challenge is independent and requires its own entry fee.
faq.q_min_picks_q: Why are there minimum picks required?
faq.q_min_picks_a: The minimum of 15 picks per phase ensures that your profitability is demonstrated over a statistically meaningful sample, not just a lucky streak.
faq.q_drawdown_a: Drawdown is calculated from your highest balance ever reached during the challenge. If your balance falls more than 15% below that peak, the challenge ends.
faq.q_daily_reset_q: When does the daily loss limit reset?
faq.q_daily_reset_a: The daily loss limit resets every day at 00:00 UTC. Your starting balance for the day is recorded at that point.
faq.q_stake_limit_q: Is there a maximum stake per pick?
faq.q_stake_limit_a: Yes. The maximum stake per pick is 5% of your current balance at the time of placement.
faq.q_payout_when_q: When can I request a payout?
faq.q_payout_when_a: Once you're in the funded phase and have positive P&L above your starting balance, you can request a payout at any time.
faq.q_kyc_q: Why do I need to verify my identity (KYC)?
faq.q_kyc_a: Identity verification is required before your first payout to comply with financial regulations and prevent fraud.
faq.q_methods_q: What payment methods are available for payouts?
faq.q_methods_a: We support bank wire, USDT, USDC, Bitcoin, and PayPal. The processing time is 3‚Äì5 business days.
faq.q_time_q: How long does a payout take?
faq.q_time_a: Most payouts are processed within 3‚Äì5 business days after approval. Crypto payouts are typically faster.
faq.q_affiliate_q: How does the affiliate program work?
faq.q_affiliate_a: Join the affiliate program from your dashboard and get a unique referral link. You earn 5% commission on every challenge fee paid by your referrals (10% for top affiliates). Commissions are paid to your preferred method.
faq.q_gift_q: Can I buy a challenge as a gift?
faq.q_gift_a: Yes! On the challenges page, you can purchase a challenge as a gift. The recipient receives a unique redemption link by email to activate their challenge.
faq.q_sports_a: We cover soccer (Liga MX, Copa Libertadores, Premier League, and more), basketball (NBA), American football (NFL), tennis (ATP/WTA), and MMA (UFC/Bellator). Market types: moneyline, handicap (spread), and totals.
faq.contact_desc: Our support team typically responds within a few hours.

settings.weeklyLimitDesc: Limit how much you can deposit per rolling 7-day window.
settings.safetyDesc: Self-exclusion prevents you from purchasing new challenges for the selected period. This applies across all payment methods.
settings.permExcludedStatus: Your account is permanently excluded from purchasing challenges.
settings.permWarning: This cannot be undone. Type CONFIRM to proceed.
